[2]...May you be blessed in your going forth as you were in your coming.... 
[3]And let us say... Ah -- ah -- ah....men.... 
[4]Apparently the power cell in the timer gave out precisely thirteen minutes before the device was set to go off. So we can only conclude that once again God has intervened to save the Jewish people.... 
[5]As you know, Cindy, thirteen is a mystical number in the Jewish faith. We believe that God has thirteen attributes... 
[6]...Of which the highest is ein sof, which means "without end," or, sometimes, "nothingness without end...." 
[7]The purest form of spirit...
dialogues.REPORTER:
[1]According to police, he had just left the restaurant and was walking the block and a half back to his office, when the gunman stepped out of this doorway, fired seven times at point- blank range...then fled on foot. 
[2]...Paramedics arrived within ninety seconds, but Mr. Manzetti was declared dead at the scene. 
[3]...You're saying that when he first appeared at your house, you had no idea he was Jewish.... 
[4]What do you mean? 
[5]In the Third Reich, weren't a number of high-ranking Nazis of Jewish origin? 
[6]The papers are going to report tomorrow that your colleague, Curtis Zampf, has been a federal informant for the past two years. Do you believe that? 
[7]And so, on this, the most solemn day of the Jewish year, a former yeshiva student is being sought in connection with a monstrous hate crime that --
